name: Flora's Ambush
description:
Your spaceship crashed on an island... Collect ressources and survive to repair it!

Controls:

WASD (QWERTY) /ZQSD (AZERTY): Move

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

E: Open craft menu (Crafting is mandatory!)

Left Mouse Button: Interact/use item

1/2/3/4 or Mouse Wheel : Switch Inventory Slot

TIPS:

  • Once your hunger bar (brown) is depleted, you will begin to lose health (red bar).
  • Eating when having an almost full hunger bar will give you the difference in health.
  • If you're lost, try shaking a tree with your hands!
  • Beware of the acid rain.
  • To use the crystal extractor, find a red crystal and hold the Left Mouse Button until you gain fuel. Due to time, I couldn't show a visual indicator that the crystal is empty, so if it doesn't work, you probably already extracted the fuel in it!

SOUNDS MADE BY KOLEX, thanks :)
